alert.note: Alert for Holt (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 30 at 10:27PM CDT until March 30 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Holt County in north central Nebraska... * Until 1100 PM CDT. * At 1026 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles west of Ewing, or 18 miles south of O`Neill, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Ewing, Knievels Corner and Goose Lake State Wildlife Management Area. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 320 and 328. Highway 281 between mile markers 166 and 170. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
